title: T206 Mathewson Dark Cap Piedmont back
author: 71buc

posts.post_title: T206 Mathewson Dark Cap Piedmont back
posts.post_content:
FS: T206 Piedmont Dark Cap Mathewson. This one has been in my collection for well over 30 years. I never graded it and won’t speculate what it would grade. It is a very pretty example. There is a light crease that runs through his glove and is visible on the reverse running through the M. It doesn’t detract from the eye appeal.  I’m asking $1650 delivered payment via PayPal. PM me if you are interested. Thanks for looking.

Mike
